data.price: 139. Ha tabar yaraannina, hana murugoonnina, idinkaa sarreyn,  haddaad tihiin mu’miniin.
data.arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

dua.name: Dua for Resilience
dua.significanceReason: Encourages believers to maintain hope, strength, and emotional resilience during challenging times. Promotes psychological and spiritual endurance.
